serve.description: Contains serve specific properties. You can change these settings and see the immediate effect after running 'npm run serve'

port.description: HTTP port to use to serve the bundles (default: 4321)

memory.description: Memory limit for the dev server in MB (default: 8192)

isLibraryComponent.description: Should be true, when running inside library component project type (default:false)

locale.description: Local code when running in a multi-language scenario

config.description: Serve configuration to run on a startup

openUrl.description: Url to open on a startup. If empty, no url will be opened

loggingLevel.description: Logging level, 'minimal' notifies about errors and new builds only, 'normal' adds bundle information, 'detailed' displays maximum information about each bundle (default: 'normal')

fullScreenErrors.description: Whether to show errors with a full-screen overlay on UI or not (only in console)

hotRefresh.description: When true, enables webpack's Hot Module Replacement (HMR) feature, read more here [TODO]

reactProfiling.description: When true, enables react profiling mode through React Chrome extension (default: false)

containers.description: Explicitly enables containerized environment support (default: false)

debug.description: When true, enables debug mode (default: false)
